description:
Sales Manager
Pharmaceutical Manufacturing
York, PA
Hybrid
Up to $150,000

Job Summary:
Drive new business growth by expanding work plans with new and existing customers. Develop and implement sales strategies in an assigned territory, meeting financial sales goals and supporting the strategic plan. Responsibilities include prospecting, coordinating meetings, conducting due diligence, and contributing to strategic planning.

Essential Functions:
• Identify and engage prospects at various levels in pharmaceutical companies.
• Develop a qualified lead database through multiple channels.
• Coordinate initial meetings, deliver company presentations, and assess strategic fit.
• Perform initial project due diligence, provide forecasts, and assist in negotiations.
• Utilize comprehensive understanding of offerings and pharmaceutical development needs.
• Maintain accurate records of sales and prospecting activities in the CRM database.
• Execute a portion of the Strategic Plan for assigned territory to drive revenue growth.
• Provide market feedback for the development of new drug delivery technologies.

Additional Responsibilities:
• Contribute to the annual strategic planning process.
• Maintain high levels of customer satisfaction and collaborate effectively with internal teams.
• Demonstrate a commitment to company principles and compliance with cGMP requirements.
• Uphold safety regulations and company policies.

Job Specifications:
• Over 5 years of consultative selling or customer-facing pharmaceutical experience.
• Bachelor's degree required.
• Willingness to travel and collaborate with a global team.
• Strong communication, presentation, and project management skills.
• Proven track record of entering and closing new projects and achieving sales goals.
• Strategic thinking, organizational skills, and ability to work cross-functionally.
• Maintain confidentiality and proficiency in standard office software.
• Basic knowledge of negotiating confidentiality and supply agreements.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $100,000.00 - $150,000.00 per year
